name: ICE QUEST
description:
Description

In the north country of Astria, an ice dragon came from a far land and froze Astria. Hönir is sent by his country to defeat him...

Instruction :

How to play:

Z/Q for AZERTY keyboard

W/A for QWERTY keyboard

  • Z/W/↑: Up
  • Q/A/← : Left
  • S/↓: Down
  • D/→ : Right
  • SPACE : Attack

Credits :

Graphics : Ulysse Saragas

Music : Ulysse Saragas

Developper : Loïck Caillon, Florian Pasquier, Ulysse Saragas, Eric Ung.
